purpose: To ensure the safety and security of Acme Corp’s data, people, and reputation.

problems.description: Growing frequency of phishing attacks targeting employees.
Lack of security awareness among staff.

mission.statement: Protect Acme Corp’s assets and reputation by preventing, detecting, and responding to security threats.

goals.name: Reduce phishing incidents by 50%
goals.description: Implement company-wide security training and advanced email filtering.

goals.name: Achieve SOC2 compliance
goals.description: Prepare documentation and conduct required audits.

strategies.description: Implement automated email scanning and quarantine.

infrastructure.notes: Migrating legacy systems to AWS by end of 2025.

projects.name: Phishing Awareness Campaign
projects.description: Quarterly campaigns to raise employee awareness.

projects.name: SOC2 Preparation
projects.description: Collect documents and policies, conduct internal audits.

narrative: Acme Corp’s security program is evolving rapidly to address emerging threats. With new hires and ongoing training, we aim to embed a security-first culture across all departments. Major risks are tracked and reviewed monthly.
